item.brrrrock-extra.yeeterite_hammer.ext: Sneak & Right-click with Tool in Hand to change Size
item.brrrrock-extra.yeeterite_membrane.t: Used to create a Yeeterite Elytra (Armoured Elytra)
Combine with Yeeterite Chestplate & Elytra in Smithing Table
item.brrrrock.yeeterite_arrow.tooltip: §5This is no normal Arrow and no normal Bow can contain it§r
item.brrrrock.yeeterite_bow.tooltip: §5A Bow not of this Dimension, said to defy the rules of this World§r
item.brrrrock.yeeterite_bow.tooltip_2: §o§4Not to be used around beloved Pets§r
text.config.brrrrock-extra.category.Cust: Set the settings for the Custom Hammer Mining Mode
text.config.brrrrock-extra.category.Void: Change the settings for launching away Entities when shot
text.config.brrrrock-extra.option.Custom: Toggle the Custom Hammer Mining Mode
text.config.brrrrock-extra.option.FireRe: Disabled to stop the full Yeeterite Armour set from granting Fire Resist Effect
text.config.brrrrock-extra.option.Hammer:
Currently broken in 1.21
Thickness of the Hammer Highlight Outlines
0 will remove the outlines
text.config.brrrrock-extra.option.LavaSi: See under Lava when wearing full Yeeterite Armour
text.config.brrrrock-extra.option.Overri:
Override Diggus Maximus Max Distance (Must be changed here as this overrides the Diggus Configuration)
§e[Requires Diggus Maximus Reborn]

Override Diggus Maximus Max Mined amount (Must be changed here as this overrides the Diggus Configuration)
§4Warning: Setting this too high will cause performance issues when mining Large Amounts
§e[Requires Diggus Maximus Reborn]
text.config.brrrrock-extra.option.UseCus: Disable the Custom Sound when firing a Yeeterite Void Arrow
text.config.brrrrock-extra.option.VoidBo: Disable the Void Arrow from launching away Entities when shot
text.config.brrrrock-extra.option.Yeeter:
Chance of getting a Yeeterite Arrow from Ancient City Chests
1.0 is 100% [Default: 0.05 (5%)]

Chance of getting a Yeeterite Membrane from End City Treasure Chests
1.0 is 100% [Default: 0.05 (5%)]
text.config.brrrrock-extra.title: Brrrrock+ (Yeeterite Extras) Configuration
